title: France panorama. [No. 68/30]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. The French political scene - the new government. 2. Sports and champions - International swimming championships. 3. Tribute to Leon Poirier. 4. The avant garde school. 5. The curious facets of France - the devil’s treasure.
